page.title: 09Farming near Aston Cantlow
page.content: Most of our area is covered in fields. There are tracks through the fields and some have barns in them. The following is a list of farms in this area; Hill Farm, Labrador Farm, Folly Farm, Holyoake Farm, Glebe Farm, Wheathill Farm, Nells Farm, Lower Farm, Redlands Farm, Silesbourne Farm and last Retreat Farm. The soil is often heavy clay. The fields are typically divided by hedges into 6 acre lots. Roughly 40% is for wheat 25% of the fields are for silage, 25% is for oilseed rape, 10% is for grazing sheep and cattle. Recently some farms have removed hedgerows and put in land drains.
